name: PHASEConeDirectivityModelSubbandParameters
desc: A data set that projects sound of a certain frequency outward in the shape of a cone.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a data set that projects sound of a certain frequency outward in the shape of a cone.

items.name: var frequency: Double
items.desc: A frequency in the audio spectrum where the subband resonates most.

items.name: var innerAngle: Double
items.desc: An angle, in degrees, that determines the size of the audio emitting area inside the cone.

items.name: var outerAngle: Double
items.desc: An angle, in degrees, that determines the size of the audio emitting area outside the cone.

items.name: var outerGain: Double
items.desc: The loudness of the audio the outside area of the cone emits.

items.name: func setAngles(innerAngle: Double, outerAngle: Double)
items.desc: Configures a focus area for cone-based sound directivity.
